title: BARD - We're Trying, We're Trying
itunes:title: BARD - We're Trying, We're Trying
description:
Adam and Mark link up Sunday morning to discuss the lawyers in the Depp/Heard trial and how their performances are playing out online as opposed to in the courtroom, and they discuss Adam's recent appearance on 'Real Time with Bill Maher'

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
